summary:
Meet Chester - Welcome to the delightful corner of our website dedicated to Chester, Donald Trump's beloved pet hamster. Chester, also known by his playful nickname "$CHESTER," is more than just a pet—he's a symbol of joy, companionship, and the lighter side of life.

 About Chester? - Chester joined the Trump family a few years ago and quickly became a cherished member. Known for his energetic personality and adorable antics, Chester has captured the hearts of everyone who meets him. His golden fur and bright eyes are a common sight around the Trump household, bringing a sense of warmth and happiness.
